    • loadMap

      @PostMapping("/loadMap") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> loadMap(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Load a map from an XML file
      Parameters:
      file - - The XML file containing the map
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the map data 200 OK if the map is loaded successfully 400 Bad Request if an error occurs while loading the map 500 Internal Server Error if an error occurs

    • loadDeliveryRequest

      Parameters:
      file - - The XML file containing the delivery request
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the delivery request data 200 OK if the delivery request is loaded successfully 400 Bad Request if an error occurs while loading the delivery request 500 Internal Server Error if an error occurs

    • assignCourier

      @PutMapping("/assignCourier") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> assignCourier(@RequestBody Map<String,Long> body)
      Assign a courier to a delivery request
      Parameters:
      body - A map containing the courier id and the delivery request id
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the result of the assignment 204 No Content if assignment is successful 400 Bad Request if assignment is not possible 500 Internal Server Error if an error occurs

    • calculateOptimalRoute

      @GetMapping("/calculateOptimalRoute") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> calculateOptimalRoute()
      Calculate the optimal route
      Returns:
      A list of list of Long containing the optimal route The first list contains the ids of the couriers The following lists contain the ids of the delivery requests for each courier
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the optimal route cannot be calculated

    • saveSession

      @GetMapping("/saveSession") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> saveSession()
      Save the session to an XML file and download it
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the result of the save 200 OK if the session is saved successfully 500 Internal Server Error if an error occurs

    • restoreSession

      @PostMapping("/restoreSession") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> restoreSession(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Restore the session from an XML file
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the result of the restoration 200 OK if the session is restored successfully 500 Internal Server Error if an error occurs
